code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant Nix
    participant /nix/store
    participant config.nix
    participant ShellScript
    participant Program(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)

    User ->> config.nix: Defines configuration
    Nix ->> config.nix: Evaluates and compiles
    config.nix ->> ShellScript: Generates
    Nix ->> ShellScript: Evaluates and compiles
    Nix ->> Program(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode): Builds and compiles
    ShellScript -->> Program(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream): Executes
    config.nix -->> /nix/store: Outputs stored
    Program(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) -->> /nix/store: Binaries stored
    ShellScript -->> /nix/store: Scripts stored
